name: Disable-AllAppPermissions
commandPattern: $permissions = @('location', 'webcam', 'microphone', 'documentsLibrary', 'broadFileSystemAccess', 'contacts', 'appointments', 'email', 'userNotificationListener', 'phoneCall', 'radios', 'chat'); foreach ($perm in $permissions) { $path = "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\CapabilityAccessManager\ConsentStore\$perm"; New-Item -Path $path -Force | Out-Null; Set-ItemProperty -Path $path -Name 'Value' -Type String -Value 'Deny' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
